product.title: DuckTales: Christmas at the North Pole | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
DuckTales: Christmas at the
North Pole

This fun holiday favorite features the stars of DuckTales, a popular animated Disney series based on the adventures of Scrooge McDuck and his great-nephews. In this spirited story, the group celebrates Christmas at the North Pole, complete with reindeer, decorations, and a visit from St. Nick himself. Even the perpetually grumpy Scrooge can’t help but get swept up in the spirit of the season. The holidays are the perfect time to help your child celebrate his or her love for reading.

Tie-in Activity: If you know someone whose loneliness makes them dread the holidays, encourage your child to do something to help them embrace the season, whether it’s making a batch of Christmas cookies, a homemade ornament, a holiday card, or simply singing a holiday song.
